attributes.action: Insist that the Uk press report fairly on the Madeleine Mccann case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Uk press\media should report fairly on the Madeleine Mccann Case, giving both sides of the story.  Goncarlo Amaral should be allowed to speak openely in the UK and he should not be abused in the UK press.  We should be given all information from both sides of this case and be free to form our own opinons.
